select
distinct
,pad_status,vm_status from (select rf_fault_feedback.*,rf_pad.pad_status,rf_pad.vm_status from rf_fault_feedback LEFT JOIN rf_pad on rf_pad.pad_id=rf_fault_feedback.pad_id) m
order by ${orderByClause}
